page.title: 20Credits
page.content: The authors of these pages are members of the fourth form at Tadcaster Grammar School and have combined their work on the Domesday Project with the field work to be included in their C.S.E. in Social and Environmental Studies. They are: Lorraine Dawson,Jonathan Williams, Pamela Dunwell, Melanie Vince, Brendan Davey, Andrew Ennis, Simon Sledmore, Mark Holmes, Andrew Terry, Elizabeth Wake, Becky Price, Claire Wright, David Smith, Jane Kitson, Rachelle Wilstrop, Pauline Worsley, Simon Wiltshire, Helen Best, and Trevor Morley. The teachers who organised the work were, Mr.Peter Braithwaite, Mrs.Anita Carr, Mr.David Harrison and Miss Trish O'Gorman.
